text: Cuncush (Ancash Quechua for Puya raimondii)Leonel Alexander Menacho López, Yachakuqkunapa Shimi Qullqa, Anqash Qhichwa Shimichaw (Ministerio de Educación), Wordbook Ancash Quechua-Spanish is a mountain in the southern part of the Cordillera Blanca in the Andes of Peru, about high. It is situated in the Ancash Region, Recuay Province, Catac District. Cuncush lies southwest of Mururaju and northwest of Pukarahu. == References == Category:Mountains of Peru Category:Mountains of Ancash Region
title: Kunkush
